item.title: Adding link to the blog
item.description:
In Hugo, is possible add a link in your blog easily.

One option is add .Site.Menus.main to the theme.

In the theme Hyde-X is already done with those lines:

{{ range .Site.Menus.main }}
<li class="sidebar-nav-item"><a href="{{ .URL | absURL }}">{{ .Name }}</a></li>
{{end}}

Then, in my config.toml I added:

[[menu.main]]
name = "Subscribe"
identifier = "subscribe"
url = "/index.xml"

Done! Nothing to change except my configuration file.
